story: Collective is a member of the Commissars, a group of Communists who were the first, and last, test subjects of Project Pavlov. Project Pavlov was a Soviet plan to use the captured body of the deceased Claw to give mental control powers to ordinary humans.

The project was a success even beyond this goal, which each of the four test subjects gaining a different power from the Claw: mind control, super strength, energy blasts, and growth. Collective gained the mind control abilities of the Claw.
